page.title: 19THE WAY PEOPLE LIVE
page.content: There are not many{jobs}in this area, except for jobs serving other people, such as postmen, small shopkeepers, a Citroen garage in Walkhampton and a Morris Minor specialty garage on the B3121 between the railway line and Dousland. The garages probably cater for people who drive into the area. Most people{commute}to work elsewhere, especially Tavistock and Plymouth. Children over 11 commute to Tavistock Comprehensive School. Very few people travel in to work in this area - some teachers and pupils at Walkhampton School - and the{vicar. He is also the vicar of Meavy and runs both churches. He lives at Meavy. Some work is provided by the{Forestry } Commission and{SWWA}around Burrator. Some people commute through the area -eg. teachers and prison officers travelling to Princetown.
